text: is an American indie pop band made by brothers Met. They are a group of singers, multi-instrumentalists, and songwriters. The brothers grew up in New York City. They were mostly focused on busking and singing covers before they changed to writing songs and touring. AJR has recorded more than 100 songs at their studio at home. They have released five studio albums on many record labels and their indie label. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:Living people Category:Indie bands Category:Musical groups from New York City
title: AJR
